quote_first: “The plane you require does not leave Sheremetyevo Airport until
quote_last:
. In any case, I have already booked two seats on it for you.”
“Two?” inquired Romanov.
“You will obviously need an expert to accompany you, unless you know considerably more about icons than you do about banking,” Poskonov added.
title: A Matter of Honor
author: Jeffrey Archer
